title: Spicy Pumpkin Soup
ingredients: ['30g butter', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '1 litre vegetable stock', '825g pumpkin puree', '2 tinned chipotle chillies in adobo sauce, finely chopped', '350ml single cream', '2 tablespoons sofrito', '1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon paprika']
